paper_abstract: We present an improved online algorithm for coloring interval graphs with bandwidth. This problem has recently been studied by Adamy and Erlebach and a 195-competitive online strategy has been presented. We improve this by presenting a 10-competitive strategy. To achieve this result, we use variants of an optimal online coloring algorithm due to Kierstead and Trotter. (C) 2006 Elsevier B.V All rights reserved.
paper_title: An improved algorithm for online coloring of intervals with bandwidth
